name: Butterfly Moves
description: Master symmetrical and dynamic poi movements with butterfly-style spins.

cards.title: Basic Butterfly
cards.description: A simple inward butterfly movement where both poi move in opposite directions in front of the body.
bulletpoints: Keep wrists close together for better control
Focus on maintaining even poi spacing
Practice with slow movements before increasing speed
cards.summaryText: Coordinate inward swings with tight wrists and even spacing before layering on speed.

cards.title: Split-Time Butterfly
cards.description: A variation where one poi moves slightly before the other, creating a staggered effect.
bulletpoints: Introduce slight delay in one poi movement
Maintain relaxed wrists for better fluidity
Gradually increase speed for smoother execution
cards.summaryText: Offset the poi timing subtly while keeping wrists relaxed so the staggered pattern stays silky.
